about_the_game:
After his missing wife sends a message to come to the town of Scarlet Lake, Ben Murphy begins to believe that something sinister is going on. Taking it upon himself to find out the truth he heads for the town, but nothing can prepare him for what he is about to find.

Scarlet Lake is a small town on Mercy island. Known by the locals for being under restrictions by the government while on going tests are carried out within the towns walls, only authorised personnel may enter.

Scavenge the derelict town for supplies, utilising whatever you can to survive. Or maybe even find the odd valuable trinket.

With limited inventory space you will have to be smart about what you choose to keep and what's necessary to keep pushing forward.

Combat akin to over the shoulder survival horror, but from a completely fresh isometric perspective.

Upgrade your arsenal and purchase the right equipment to survive the horrors that await.

The town's folk have gone mad, leaving a trail of destruction in their wake. Strange creatures seem to be taking over their bodies, transforming them into monsters. Will you be cunning and use your wits to outmanoeuvre them ? or will you fight fire with fire and destroy everything in your path ?

content_descriptors.notes: The game may contain content not suitable for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work. Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

name: Scarlet Lake Demo
short_description: Delve into a retro survival horror where everything is not what it seems. You control Ben Murphy, a detective sent to investigate the strange on-goings in a small town, only to be caught in a nightmare surrounded by terrifying creatures. What dark mysteries will you uncover in Scarlet Lake?
